page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: teen-age children,is a group of middle aged couples who have moved from other parts of the country often the south east and London in particular,to operate businesses in and around Taunton.Taunton in the 1980's is very much a{growth}centre in the South West of England.It has been helped by it's promotion to Regional capital(i.e. county town of Somerset in the local Government re-organisation of 1973;it has excellent Motorway links via the M5 to the Midlands and South East(via M4);and also has fast Rail links with London..the fastest trains completing the journey in 1 and 3/4 hours.Hence as Taunton has grown..and investment in Taunton totalled Â£48,000,000 in the year to July 1985 for example..so the pleasant surrounding villages have received a new lease of life,by attracting successful businessmen to
